channel.title: Runeblaze server recruiting devs ~read here~
channel.description:
Hello moparscape we are recruiting devs for the best /most complete coming server
were currently working on 100% npc/monster spawns for real rs 100% real rs is what we are going for but doubled rates. so what we need is more devs to completly finish a full real rs server
we are currently working on a 467 (whatever newest rs is) now were just working on geting it to fully connect to our server.
come to http://hrose-server.com/rsdev/ to apply you need to show your work and no we dont want no noob shit like call messages and placing npcs or anything noobish like that if your good enough you will be added
when our server/client is done it will be web client so it cant be leached fully 24/7 on a dedi on a mysql based source made fully 100% by us so come join today!!
